CardData.FlavorText: <line-height=100%><size=200%>Y</size>our attack on the caravan had unintended consequences. Lights bloom in the nearby tower, followed by the echo of metal-shod feet upon stone as yet more orcs rouse themselves to investigate.

Localization.Title: Torches from the Tower
Localization.Text:
Add 1 Mirkwood Patrol.
End of round: Gain +1 <size=120%><sprite=4></size> every round until you travel
